law.catch_line: Confidentiality of drug and alcohol test results -- Exceptions -- Use of results in criminal proceeding against applicant prohibited.

text.section: Information on drug and alcohol test results for tests administered pursuant to KRS 351.182, 351.183, 351.184, 351.185, 351.102, 351.103, 351.1041, 351.106, 351.110, 351.120, 351.127, 351.1291, 351.170, 352.010, 352.180, 352.210, and 352.390 shall not be released or used in any criminal proceeding against the applicant.

law.history: Amended 2015 Ky. Acts ch. 87, sec. 24, effective June 24, 2015. -- Created 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 241, sec. 5, effective July 12, 2006.
